Posts.Content: Nov 8, 2009 10:30PM Mar0426 wrote: This is my first post.  I have had my diagnosis since 10/15.  Two biopsies (tumos & lymph node) later They are calling it Stage II.  I am having a lumpectomy and auxillary lymph node surgery this week.  How long will I be out of commission.  How much help did you all need right after surgrey?  It's a bit scary right now but I am very confident in the support from my husband, family and the medical team.  I know after surgery I have chemo and rads in my future along with Hereceptin.  Wow seems like a road!
Posts.Title: Stage II w/Lymph Node Involvement Warrior517 Moderators
